original_text: And he hath brought us into this place, and hath given us this land, even a land that floweth with milk and honey.
korean_text: 이곳으로 인도하사 이 땅 곧 젖과 꿀이 흐르는 땅을 주셨나이다

sentences.original_text: And he hath brought us into this place
and hath given us this land
even a land that floweth with milk and honey
